archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Approve Product Offering Purchase Cancellation
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Approve a request to cancel a product offering purchase.

properties.value: Approve Product Offering Purchase Cancellation approves a request to cancel a product offering purchase. The ability to cancel an order may be subject to certain rules, such as it can't be cancelled if it has already in the process of being delivered. Acknowledgement Is sent to the purchasing party via email, web, and so forth.
